channel.title: (PI) Hand cannon
channel.description: How would I add the handcannon spec Gfx and anim? when I equipped the handcannon on my server it has stab,slash,lunge,block I know the item isn't coded yet and how would I do that? like edit it where

item.title: (PI) Hand cannon
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

Lulz.
Try figuring out yourself where to change the attack options for a weapon.
Hint:
Try combatassistant.
Find the interface you want it to have:
like
case (bow):
return (interface id)
Then just add it like
case (bow):
case (handcannon):
return (interface id)
Simple really.

Read full topic
